about_the_game:
Border Conqueror is a visual novel of territorial suppression in which you are the commander, Captain Fetorem, of the Second Legion "winner" Fetorem of the Norman Empire, the most powerful fighting legion in the Empire. You will defend this most dangerous frontier, suppress the rebels, manage or bully newly-conquered territories (and women), and fight against the enemy.

◆Featured Systems

◇Full CG mode can be turned on in the environment setting, and HCG can be freely browsed.

◇Pressure-Free Operation Support one-click mouse operation-Fast text-to-text system

◆Story

The story takes place in the Norman Empire in the province of Cerrado. After the Norman Empire conquered Keter, the western side of the continent was split in two, i.e. the Duchy of Sarich and of Krosa. After seven years of fighting for the throne, Sulipanaxa defeated all his rivals in Sarich. Having been ruled for seventy years, the Cesteners’ discontent with the Normans grew. The Keter exiles, who had lost their country, also came to the region. It was then that the 13th Legion, “Griffin” of the Norman Empire, suddenly rebelled and blew the trumpet of unrest.

The Norman Empire was, at this time, ruled by Empress Catherine Norman. On the advice of her brother, Prince Nicholas Norman, she sent her best legion, Second Legion “Fetorem,” from the North to the West to quell the unrest.

On one of the rainy summer days in the south of Norman, the rebels who were attacking the city were beaten by the sudden appearance of fresh troops.

"Here we come, Second Norman Legion 'Vetorem.' We see the enemy, and we are about to win!"

"The safety of the Empire depends on our courage and our swords and shields! We will win this battle. Charge!"

"How could 'Vetorem' be here?! Quick! Retreat! Save your strength!!! Retreat!!!!"

"The northern border is 450 miles from Cerriato, and it took them 9 days to cover it in the middle of a rainstorm! What speed..."

The Norman Empire's forces were brought to bear on the battle against Shaliki and the country was shaken to its core. The story of the Second Battle of Cerrado began...

◆Gameplay


The game is a visual novel with strategic elements. Players take on the role of Norman's strongest legion commander and "Attack" to recover territory, then "Transfer" to defend territory. During the battle, "Attack" or "Defend" is decided with reference to "Morale,” where the result of "Morale" determines the victory or defeat of each battle round.

Players can raise "Policing" in the territory to increase recruitment, reduce the chance of bandits, "Recruit," and return to the army barracks for "Training."



When the territory reaches the "Policing" standard, the player will catch 6 women suspected of being spies as the game progresses. The women have attributes such as "Preference," "Dislike," and "Sexual Fetish." The player can use commands such as "Gaze," "Touch," "Kiss," "Hug," "Glare," "Insult," "Lick earlobe," "Kiss chest," "Tease private parts," "Rub butt," "Slap roughly," and "Beat abdomen" on the women to perform foreplay and choose sexual activities like "Penetrate vagina," "Penetrate anus," "Gang rape," etc. Options to have sex include "Thrust gently," "Thrust intensively," "Thrust roughly," and "Ejaculate." Depending on the result of the tutelage, you can raise the "Hentai-level" of the women and decide whether to find the "Spies" to save your life.

In addition, players can have 3 women to "Serve in the bed" in the "Sleeping tent" after dusk.

◆ Game Features

◇ War themed, multi-character game. 33 basic CGs, including more than 500 differentials

◇ 3 types of endings (Excluding normal bad endings)
◇ Game text: 100,000
◇ A visual novel with strategic elements, a medieval style game.
